item.title: Episode NaN - Tue Jan 20 2026
item.description: Top Stories for Tue Jan 20 2026 Here are the links for the stories: 1. https://www.ewtnnews.com/vaticano-updates-a-franciscan-jubilee-and-a-call-for-peace-2026-01-20/ 2. https://www.catholicherald.co.uk/vatican-formally-rejects-use-of-title-co-redemptrix-in-new-marian-document/ 3. https://www.catholicherald.co.uk/pope-leo-xiv-urges-patience-as-vatican-tribunal-begins-new-trial-on-rupnik/ 4. https://www.catholicherald.co.uk/pope-calls-for-renewed-reverence-and-beauty-in-church-liturgy/ 5. https://zenit.org/2026/01/19/live-your-spirituality-without-ever-separating-yourselves-from-the-rest-of-the-ecclesial-body-pope-leo-xiv-to-the-neocatechumenal-way/
